concept.title: SDC Record Functions
concept.shortdesc: Use SDC Record functions to get information about a record in the SDC Record data format, such as the ID of the stage that created a record. You might use these functions in a pipeline that processes error records based on the types of errors that occurred.

conbody.p:
functionsSDC RecordSDC Record functionsdescriptionThe following types of records are in SDC Record data format:
Any record being processed by the pipeline.
Error records.
Records written to a destination in the SDC Record data format.
